si.title: අද මුදල් විනිමය අනුපාතය
body_lines: The US dollar purchasing price was 299.0799 rupees and the sales price were Rs 308.3906 based on the currency exchange rate released by the Central Bank on Wednesday (July 24).

en.title: Today's currency exchange rate
body_lines: The US dollar purchasing price was 299.0799 rupees and the sales price were Rs 308.3906 based on the currency exchange rate released by the Central Bank on Wednesday (July 24).

summary_lines: The US dollar's buying rate was 299.0799 rupees, while its selling rate was 308.3906 rupees as per the Central Bank's latest update on July 24.
